Result.Abstract: This article aims to review the effectiveness of the “Reasoning and Rehabilitation” programme in reducing recidivism. Result.Title: How effective is the “Reasoning and Rehabilitation” programme in reducing reoffending? A meta-analysis of evaluations in four countries

Result.Title: Correctional Intervention Programs and Cost-Benefit Analysis
